data.name: BlastFort - Knight's Shield Expansion Pack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing: The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack!
The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack for BlastFort unlocks 2 new player skins, a brand new force-field item, and an exclusive item skin!
Check out the awesomeness of the new BlastFort Guarded Knight skin, to show off in multiplayer! Use the new force-field item to protect yourself from incoming waves of enemies, and projectiles! And check out the brand new Beacon Gun item skin!
data.about_the_game:
Introducing: The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack!
The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack for BlastFort unlocks 2 new player skins, a brand new force-field item, and an exclusive item skin!
Check out the awesomeness of the new BlastFort Guarded Knight skin, to show off in multiplayer! Use the new force-field item to protect yourself from incoming waves of enemies, and projectiles! And check out the brand new Beacon Gun item skin!
data.short_description: Get 2 awesome new player skins, a brand new force-field item, and an exclusive Beacon Gun item skin with The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack for BlastFort!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
